description: This update, KB4554364, fixes an issue that may cause restricted or no Internet connection status to appear in the notification area on devices that use a manually or automatically configured proxy, especially on a virtual private network (VPN). In addition, this issue may prevent some devices from connecting to the Internet by using applications that use WinHTTP or WinINet.
summary: Updates an issue that might display the wrong internet connection status for certain VPN users or might prevent some applications from connecting to the internet.
author: Microsoft
